content: grab your favorite bulky weight yarn and knit this super quick beanie featuring a squishy broken rib and a slouchy fit it s the perfect addition to anyone s beanie collection this pattern is designed to fit baby-adults and distributed into three sizes that are written as s m l xl each size measures approximately 16 18 20 22 inches when finished each size will fit many heads so i recommend choosing the size that best suits your negative/positive ease preferences this beanie is designed to be a bit slouchy but instructions are provided if you would like to alter this yarn 1 1 1 2 hanks of knit picks biggo or approximately 80 100 125 150 yards of any bulky weight yarn sample uses biggo in the colorway north pole heather if you ever have any questions comments or suggestions for ways to improve my patterns please do not hesitate to email me thegracefultangle@gmail com dm me on instagram @thegracefultangle private message me on ravelry thegracefultangle or message me on etsy thegracefultangle also please feel free to sell any items you make using my patterns i simply ask that you link back to the pattern or put my information with your listing/tag on the item if you d like post what you make on instagram using the hashtag #thegracefultangledesigns thank you
